entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 March 2023
